data.title: Productos de creación musical compatibles con Link
data.meta_description: You can use Ableton Link without Live: play Link-enabled music making products in time using multiple products and devices, or using multiple apps on the same device.
data.text:
Patterning 3. Download on the App Store

Patterning 3 is a sample-based drum machine with a deep-yet-intuitive circular interface.

By Olympia Noise Co.

Export enabledCapture ideas wherever you are and take them further in Live – use the new Export Live Set feature, now in a number of iOS apps.

. Patterning 3Download on the App Store

2020 SEMI MODULAR BEAT-MACHINE. Más información

The interface of 2020 THE SEMI MODULAR BEAT-MACHINE is just like a console of a spaceship. It allows you to wire up various modules to configure a unique beat system.

By Yotaro Shuto

. 2020 SEMI MODULAR BEAT-MACHINEMás información

New Path. Download on the App Store

New Path is a unique and playful sequencer that drastically changes the way you make music. Let colored shapes follow arrows on a 2d grid. Now choose from an exotic list of arrows to spice things up.

By The Zooo

. New PathDownload on the App Store

miRack. Download on the App Store

miRack is a Eurorack-style modular synthesizer, fx, and playground for iOS and macOS which can be used standalone or in a DAW, and comes with more than 700 modules.

By mifki Limited

. miRackDownload on the App Store

FORCE. Más información

Introducing FORCE, the ultimate in standalone end-to-end production workflows, complete with every tool you need to produce, remix, mashup and perform your tracks live.

By Akai Pro

Export enabledCapture ideas wherever you are and take them further in Live – use the new Export Live Set feature, now in a number of iOS apps.

. FORCEMás información

MPC Live. Más información

The MPC Live is a battery-operated standalone music production center fit for the studio and the stage. Features include a 7” touch display, 16GB of on-board storage, Bluetooth MIDI and much more.

By Akai Pro

Export enabledCapture ideas wherever you are and take them further in Live – use the new Export Live Set feature, now in a number of iOS apps.

. MPC LiveMás información

MPC Live II. Más información

Meet MPC Live II, the full MPC experience in its most portable configuration yet. Everything you need to make music, anywhere, right at your fingertips. There’s no need to compromise for portability.

By Akai Pro

Export enabledCapture ideas wherever you are and take them further in Live – use the new Export Live Set feature, now in a number of iOS apps.

. MPC Live IIMás información

MPC One. Más información

MPC One is a total music production solution to take your ideas from concept to finalized radio-ready beats. The MPC One packs a lot of features and workflow tools into ONE powerful punch.

By Akai Pro

Export enabledCapture ideas wherever you are and take them further in Live – use the new Export Live Set feature, now in a number of iOS apps.

. MPC OneMás información

MPC X. Más información

The flagship model in the legendary MPC line, MPC X is a powerful standalone music production device. Features include a 10.1” touch display, 16GB of on-board storage, Bluetooth MIDI and much more.

By Akai Pro

Export enabledCapture ideas wherever you are and take them further in Live – use the new Export Live Set feature, now in a number of iOS apps.

. MPC XMás información

WoodSynth. Download on the App Store

WoodSynth is a synthesizer with 4 independent layers. Each layer has 3 VCO’s plus a samples source. It also has a 16 steps sequencer per layer. It runs on iOS and OSX, stand-alone, AU, AUv3, VST, AAX.

By Woodman’s Immaculate Maple Syrup Studio

. WoodSynthDownload on the App Store

Mixet. Download on the App Store

Mixet is a multi-channel backing tracks player. It pushes the tempo when a song starts, keeping all your band members and plug-ins in sync on your show. It won't follow tempo changes by other peers.

By Gennadii Dudarek

. MixetDownload on the App Store

Patterning for iPhone. Download on the App Store

Patterning is a deep and flexible drum machine unlike any you’ve encountered before. With its elegant circular interface, it transforms your phone into a seriously inspiring tool for making beats.

By Olympia Noise Co.

Export enabledCapture ideas wherever you are and take them further in Live – use the new Export Live Set feature, now in a number of iOS apps.

. Patterning for iPhoneDownload on the App Store

EG Pulse. Download on the App Store

EG Pulse is the ultimate Drum Machine / Sampler for iOS. It can be used both in standalone or hosted as AudioUnit AU3 inside apps like GarageBand, AUM, BeatMaker3, NanoStudio2, n-Track9 and others.

By ElliottGarage Software

Export enabledCapture ideas wherever you are and take them further in Live – use the new Export Live Set feature, now in a number of iOS apps.

. EG PulseDownload on the App Store

touchscaper. Download on the App Store

Touchscaper is an instrument designed for anyone who wants to make music on their iPad simply by touching the screen. With Link integration, the chord looper is a great way to kickstart jam sessions!

By Rob Jackson

. touchscaperDownload on the App Store

Loopseque 8. Download on the App Store

Wheel-based performer for rhythm improvisation. 32 tracks Sequencer/Sampler/FX processor. Loopseque 8 is the original way to create and change patterns, play with effects and mix projects in a DJ way.

By Casual Underground

Export enabledCapture ideas wherever you are and take them further in Live – use the new Export Live Set feature, now in a number of iOS apps.

. Loopseque 8Download on the App Store

Koala Sampler. Download on the App Store

Koala is the ultimate pocket-sized sampler. Record anything with your phone's mic instantly. Use Koala to create beats with those samples, add effects and create a track!

By Elf Audio

Export enabledCapture ideas wherever you are and take them further in Live – use the new Export Live Set feature, now in a number of iOS apps.

. Koala SamplerDownload on the App Store

Triqtraq - Jam Sequencer. Download on the App Store

Create musical ideas on the go with this fun and fast mobile sequencing app. Extensive automation and sequencing options make it a truly creative tool that brings inspiration to your desktop projects.

By Zaplin Music

Export enabledCapture ideas wherever you are and take them further in Live – use the new Export Live Set feature, now in a number of iOS apps.

. Triqtraq - Jam SequencerDownload on the App Store

HeavyM. Download on the App Store

HeavyM is the easiest video mapping software in the world. Create mindblowing animations in seconds and auto-synchronize them in real-time with your music. No need to be an expert, just be creative!

By HeavyM

. HeavyMDownload on the App Store

iBassist. Download on the App Store

iBassist is much more than a virtual bass for your iPad. It's a fully featured sequencer with advanced MIDI I/O that can make your basslines follow your songs

By Luis Martinez

. iBassistDownload on the App Store

Beat Detect. Download on the App Store

Beat detect is a simple way to get the BPM of any beat by listening through the device mic. Get real-time feedback on your playing speed or sync Link-enabled apps to the tempo of an instrument.

By MIXVIBES

. Beat DetectDownload on the App Store

SNAP. Más información

SNAP will help you create great drum patterns in any musical style, on the fly, with your fingertips. Explore a new way to play and compose drums, and play with your drum machines via MIDI.

By Reactable Systems S.L.

. SNAPMás información

GrandVJ XT. Más información

GrandVJ is known for its ease of use and ‘dead simple’ customization. With Ableton Link built into GrandVJ, users are now allowed to get incredible accuracy and synchronization of video to the beat.

By Arkaos

. GrandVJ XTMás información

K Machine. Download on the App Store

A new concept of audiovisual sampler/sequencer, that allows to compose and play not only with sounds, but also with visual elements that can respond to the audio signal and/or touch gesture.

By Dominique Baillot

. K MachineDownload on the App Store

KRFT. Download on the App Store

A new approach to music production, KRFT is designed from the ground up focussed on expression and experimentation. It allow you to create music that you'd never write by hand.

By Jonah Fox

. KRFTDownload on the App Store

Groovebox. Download on the App Store

Groovebox is a free music studio app packed with inspiring synths and drum machines. From the creators of Launchpad, Groovebox lets you create your own beats and melodies on iPhone or iPad.

By Novation

Export enabledCapture ideas wherever you are and take them further in Live – use the new Export Live Set feature, now in a number of iOS apps.

. GrooveboxDownload on the App Store

CS2. Download on the App Store

CS2 is a synth that creates unique melodies with just one tap. It comes with a lot of features and is intuitive and easy to use. CS2 focuses on live performance and the fun of playing together.

By Per Loenicker

. CS2Download on the App Store

Unique for iPad. Download on the App Store

Unique sounds like syrup with dirt kicked into it. If Bootsy Collins, Roger Troutman and Daft Punk would have met up in Studio 54 to create a synth, something like Unique would have come out of it.

By Sugar Bytes GmbH

. Unique for iPadDownload on the App Store

Unique for iPhone. Download on the App Store

If Bootsy Collins, Roger Troutman and Daft Punk would have met up in Studio 54 to create a soft-synth, for sure something like Unique would have come out of it.

By Sugar Bytes GmbH

. Unique for iPhoneDownload on the App Store

BeatHawk. Download on the App Store

A complete portable music production studio for iOS. Create beats, sample, layer melodies, sequence, mix, arrange & perform songs with a blazing-fast workflow & sleek hardware-inspired user interface.

By UVItouch

Export enabledCapture ideas wherever you are and take them further in Live – use the new Export Live Set feature, now in a number of iOS apps.

. BeatHawkDownload on the App Store

Funk Drummer. Download on the App Store

Funk Drummer is the grooviest drum machine with the ability to improvise like a human drummer. The essence of authentic Funk, from classic Funk or R&B to fusion.

By Luis Martinez

. Funk DrummerDownload on the App Store

Ninja Jamm. Download on the App Store

Ninja Jamm is a music making app from UK dance act Coldcut, founders of the Ninja Tune label. Touch control, state of the art effects and killer samples invite you into the world of electronic sound.

By Ninja Tune

Export enabledCapture ideas wherever you are and take them further in Live – use the new Export Live Set feature, now in a number of iOS apps.

. Ninja JammDownload on the App Store

iPulsaret. Download on the App Store

iPulsaret is a new real-time software capable of all time-domain varieties of granular synthesis. A genuine granular playground able to generate a wide range of usual and not so usual effects.

By apeSoft

. iPulsaretDownload on the App Store

Figure. Download on the App Store

Make music in seconds. Remix and collaborate with music makers all over the world. Find beats or hooks that inspire you. Share your musical ideas and see where other music makers will take them.

By Allihoopa

. FigureDownload on the App Store

Soft Drummer. Download on the App Store

A session subtle drummer in your pocket. Easy to use and fast, it's much more than a drum machine because it can improvise musically like a human drummer with the most pure acoustic drumming sounds.

By Luis Martinez

. Soft DrummerDownload on the App Store

The Metronome by Soundbrenner. Más información

The Metronome by Soundbrenner is a professional tool to help all musicians to play with rock-solid precision. It's a powerful companion for everyone, regardless of instrument choice or skill level.

By Soundbrenner Limited

. The Metronome by SoundbrennerMás información

Moebius Lab. Download on the App Store

Moebius Lab is a multimorphic sound processor which contains a synth, a varispeed stereo sample player, 9 time domain effects, 6 spectral effects, 7 slots for external audio, and nearly 200 LFOs.

By Amazing Noises

. Moebius LabDownload on the App Store

iDensity. Download on the App Store

iDensity is a new real-time software designed for asynchronous sound file granulation, a genuine granular playground able to generate a wide range of usual and not so usual effects.

By apeSoft

. iDensityDownload on the App Store

Medly. Download on the App Store

Medly for iOS is a music sequencer that breaks up your song into sections that can be easily moved, deleted, copied, or linked together to make epic music. You can also add and automate effects.

By Medly Labs Inc.

. MedlyDownload on the App Store

Blocs Wave. Download on the App Store

Blocs Wave lets you combine sounds and loops quickly, tweak them using beautiful touchable waveforms, and record your own sounds. Real-time stretching, exporting, importing and audiobus included.

By Novation

Export enabledCapture ideas wherever you are and take them further in Live – use the new Export Live Set feature, now in a number of iOS apps.

. Blocs WaveDownload on the App Store

Reactable mobile. Download on the App Store

Create and improvise music in an intuitive and visual way. Bring the full creative power of the award-winning Reactable instrument used by renowned musicians like Björk to your mobile device.

By Reactable Systems SL

. Reactable mobileDownload on the App Store

DrumJam. Download on the App Store

DrumJam opens up the world of rhythm in a hands-on and inspiring way. Build layers from a wide range of ethnic percussion and drum kit loops and jam over the top with interactive pads.

By Sonosaurus LLC

. DrumJamDownload on the App Store

RP-1. Download on the App Store

RP-1 is a highly flexible stereo delay for iPhone and iPad that integrates with everything from Audiobus over Inter-App Audio to AudioUnit Hosts and of course Ableton Link.

By Kai Aras

. RP-1Download on the App Store

apeDelay. Download on the App Store

Spectral Delay implements up to 2048 delay lines with feedback or up to 2048 Brick-wall filters. The algorithm is based on the STFT (i.e. Short Time Fourier Transform) analysis/re-synthesis.

By apeSoft

. apeDelayDownload on the App Store

Limiter. Download on the App Store

The Amazing Noises Limiter it has a wide range of dynamic processing: from very gentle volume attenuation to heavy distortion (if you want it!).

By Amazing Noises

. LimiterDownload on the App Store

Reverb. Download on the App Store

Reverb is a Feedback Delay Network Reverb Effect, which can create nice ambiences, from small rooms to huge buildings. It can also simulate alien and unreal spaces, for your experimental fun!

By Amazing Noises

. ReverbDownload on the App Store

iSpark. Download on the App Store

iSpark is a powerful iPad production tool allowing you to create and play drum tracks, grooves and even full songs. Its sonic richness comes along with an unwavering workflow and a real flexibility.

By Arturia

. iSparkDownload on the App Store

iVCS3. Download on the App Store

Official EMS VCS3 emulator. The VCS3 was more or less the first portable commercially available synthesizer—portable in the sense that the VCS 3 was housed entirely in a small, wooden case.

By apeSoft

. iVCS3Download on the App Store

Auxy Studio. Download on the App Store

A studio in your pocket! Everything you need to make modern beats and electronic music. The easiest way to get started with real music production.

By Auxy

Export enabledCapture ideas wherever you are and take them further in Live – use the new Export Live Set feature, now in a number of iOS apps.

. Auxy StudioDownload on the App Store

SP Link Edition. Download on the App Store

SoundPrism Link Edition is an indispensable tool for songwriters or electronic musicians looking to add powerful chord progressions to their tracks with just a few taps.

By Audanika

. SP Link EditionDownload on the App Store

zMors Modular. Download on the App Store

zMors Modular is a modular synthesizer. Add various modules to your patch and connect them with cables. Use hardware gear with up to 8 usb outputs for audio and/or control voltage send.

By mobile only

. zMors ModularDownload on the App Store

Fugue Machine. Download on the App Store

The world’s first multi-playhead piano roll. Create a music sequence and play it back with up to four playheads at once — each at various speeds, directions, and pitches.

By Alexandernaut

. Fugue MachineDownload on the App Store

Elastic Drums. Download on the App Store

Elastic Drums is a drum app containing 6 channels of synthesized sounds, a step sequencer and 4 fx channels. All parameters are tweakable in an elastic way.

By O-G-SUS

Export enabledCapture ideas wherever you are and take them further in Live – use the new Export Live Set feature, now in a number of iOS apps.

. Elastic DrumsDownload on the App Store

Audiobus: Mixer for music apps. Download on the App Store

Open up new worlds of creative music making possibilities with Audiobus, the musical hub that lets you use your compatible music apps together, just like virtual cables.

By Audiobus Pty Ltd

. Audiobus: Mixer for music appsDownload on the App Store

iELECTRIBE for iPad. Download on the App Store

Korg’s ELECTRIBE·R has been coveted by dance musicians for ten years running. Today, this indispensable instrument has been reborn as a dedicated iPad app – the KORG iELECTRIBE virtual analog beatbox.

By Korg

. iELECTRIBE for iPadDownload on the App Store

iKaossilator. Download on the App Store

The original gadget instrument - Korg’s palm-sized KAOSSILATOR synthesizer - is now available as an iPhone app.

By Korg

Export enabledCapture ideas wherever you are and take them further in Live – use the new Export Live Set feature, now in a number of iOS apps.

. iKaossilatorDownload on the App Store

KORG Gadget 2. Download on the App Store

KORG Gadget offers a collection of more than 20 different mobile synthesizers and drum machines called “Gadgets” which you can freely combine to produce powerful electronic music.

By Korg

Export enabledCapture ideas wherever you are and take them further in Live – use the new Export Live Set feature, now in a number of iOS apps.

. KORG Gadget 2Download on the App Store
